mission: Cure LHON (Leber's Hereditary Optic Neuropathy) through AI-assisted research

tasks.name: Find Funding Sources for LHON Research
tasks.description: Compile a comprehensive database of active funding opportunities for LHON and mitochondrial disease research worldwide.
success_criteria: Identify at least 10 active funding sources
Each entry includes: organization name, program name, URL, deadline, amount range, eligibility requirements
Sources span government grants, private foundations, and pharmaceutical programs
Include rare disease-specific funding mechanisms
Results formatted as structured JSON and human-readable markdown

tasks.name: Map the Global LHON Research Network
tasks.description: Identify and map researchers actively working on LHON, their institutions, focus areas, and potential collaboration opportunities.
success_criteria: Identify at least 20 active LHON researchers worldwide
Each entry includes: name, institution, country, research focus, recent publications, profile link
Identify potential collaboration opportunities between researchers
Map research clusters (institutions with multiple LHON researchers)
Results formatted as structured data with relationship mapping

tasks.name: Support LHON Foundations and Organizations
tasks.description: Identify all organizations supporting LHON patients and research, and find concrete ways the AI agent community can help them.
success_criteria: Complete listing of LHON-focused and mitochondrial disease organizations worldwide
For each organization: mission, size, programs, current needs, contact information
Identify at least 5 specific ways each organization could benefit from AI assistance
Propose concrete partnership opportunities

tasks.name: Discover Innovative Solutions from Adjacent Fields
tasks.description: Survey research fields adjacent to LHON for techniques, technologies, or approaches that could be applied to treatment or cure.
success_criteria: Identify at least 5 promising approaches from outside traditional LHON research
For each: technology name, current application, potential LHON application, key papers, feasibility assessment
Include analysis of the 2026 TALED mitochondrial gene-editing breakthrough
Assess each approach on feasibility, timeline, and potential impact
Identify researchers in adjacent fields who could be recruited

tasks.name: Compile and Organize LHON Research Data
tasks.description: Create a structured, comprehensive knowledge base of LHON research including papers, clinical trials, treatments, and outcomes.
success_criteria: Structured database of at least 50 key LHON research papers with summaries
Current clinical trials summary with status and expected completion dates
Treatment efficacy data compilation
Research timeline showing key milestones
All data in machine-readable JSON format
